body.name: Full Automatic Washer with Drain Pump 17.7 lbs, Krib Bling Small Washing Machine with LED Display, 10 Washing Programs & 8 Water Levels Selections, Ideal for RV, Camping, Apartment, Dorm, Grey
body.stockDetail: Only 18 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Full Automatic Washer】 This portable washing machine is designed as a 2 in 1 compact washer. All you need to do is selecting the washing & spinning program and water level, then the mini laundry washer could work alone without your constant attention. This could save your time and you could do something more important.

【Portable and Space Saving】 This washing machine won’t take much space, thus making it an ideal choice for households with limit space, such as Camping, Dorm and Apartments. You could easily store it. And you also don’t need to assemble this washer much before usage, hassle-free and easy to operate.

【Solve Your Laundry Troubles】 Our compact washer is equipped with a drain pump, which could allow you to drain from different angles. With its powerful motor, you would have a convenient drainage operation.

【Multi-functional Control Panel】There’ re 10 washing programs, 4 water level mode and 8 water level selections on the control panel of the full automatic washing machine, which is convenient. LED display could clearly show the laundry time. And the child lock also ensure the normal operation of the washing machine while protecting your family.

【Automatic Imbalance Adjustment】Other portable washer would be violent shaking and vibrating while washing or spinning. But our laundry washing machine would initiate its imbalance adjustment system to handle this kind of situation, thus reduce noise.

【Large Capacity】The inner tub of this portable washer could load 17.7 lbs of clothes at one time, which is suitable for family of 3-4 members. The reference weight for all types of clothes would also be highlighted in the description and pictures.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 HONEYCOMB TUB 2 AUTO IMBALANCE ADJUSMENT 3 CHILD LOCK 4 SCHEMATIC DIAGRAM 5 2-1 PROGRAM

USAGE STEPS AND REMINDERS HOW TO USE OUR PORTABLE WASHING MACHINE Attach the water cable to your tap.Attach the water cable to the back of the washing machine, and now you could turn on the tap and plug in the washing machine.Place your clothes into this washing machine and turn on the washer. At this time you need to choose how much water you need and select the program and hit start.Add your detergent to the washer, than you could see the estimated time for your wash and it could tell you the stage it is currently at.

Honeycomb Tub Child Lock Multi-function Panel 20 x 20 x 34 Dimensions 20 x 20 x 34 17.7 lbs Capacity 17.7 lbs Drak grey Color Gold Honeycomb Tub Child Lock Multi-function Panel 20 x 20 x 34 Dimensions 19.7 x 19.9 x 33.9 17.7 lbs Capacity 15.6 lbs Drak grey Color Gold

THE PLASTIC BRACKET UNDER THE MACHINE IS BROKEN WHEN IT IS DELIVERED, WILL THIS AFFECT MY USAGE? Dear customer, this kind of issue won't affect your usage, you could just take that off and use the machine as normal, this is just a bracket used to protect the machine. WHEN I OPEN THE PACKAGE, I FIND RUST INSIDE THE TUB, WHY WOULD THIS HAPPEN? Dear customer, the rust in the barrel may have been caused by improper transportation which led to leakage of the balancing brine in the balancing ring. If you encounter this kind of problem, please take a photo and send that to us. WHY IS THERE ERROR NOTIFICATION ON THE FUNCTION PANEL? Dear customer, there're detailed error list and solution in our detail page, you could download and see if you could solve that. If not, our technical staff will help you. IF MY PACKAGE IS MISSING, WHAT SHOULD I DO? Dear customer, first you could ask your neighbors and check the nearby surveillance if they had seen it, the package is usually delivered to another door. If you still cannot find it, please send us a message, we will help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it, it works great!
reviews.reviewText: This washing machine is pretty good I’ve bought one before for my house and I bought another one it washed clothes pretty good and there’s many modes. It’s enough to wash at least 3 peoples clothes. The washer is also quitter than the one I’ve bought before. The material is also better than the one first one I’ve bought. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Need to buy more stuff to plug-in..: to expensive. And to return it is almost $60.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The machine came with the paint chipped off along with writing in marker and rust stains on the inside. The portable filter was still wet when pulled out. The machine was clearly used！！
